duration: This parameter is the recording time. When increasing the value of this parameter, the recording time will increase.
fps: This parameter is the number of shooting per-second. Gif image will looks more smoothly (like video). When increasing the value of this parameter, the number of shots per second will increase.
resolution: This parameter is the size of image. It can be 480x360px, 858x480px or 720x1280px. Please note: area capture size will be not more than the selected value of this parameter.
quality: This parameter is responsible for colors and image quality.
preview: Do you want to see preview when you record pictures from the webcam? This parameter is responsible for this.
delay: Do you need 3sec delay before the recording starts ? This parameter is responsible for this.
